markdownRemark.html: The Alcazar de los Reyes Cristianos complex is an old fortress that became the residence of the Catholic Monarchs for eight years and is made up of four walls finished at the corners by four towers. Essential to see in Cordoba, historical / cultural monument of the first order, beautiful views of the city and splendid gardens

frontmatter.title: Alcazar
frontmatter.description: Alcazar - The Alcazar de los Reyes Cristianos complex is an old fortress that became the residence of the Catholic Monarchs for eight years and is made up of four walls finished at the corners by four towers. Essential to see in Cordoba, historical / cultural monument of the first order, beautiful views of the city and splendid gardens
frontmatter.address: Plaza Campo Santo de los Mártires, s/n, 14004 Córdoba
tags: Top things to do in Cordoba
